# paymentNetwork

**Instance Property**

The payment network for the card that funds this transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var paymentNetwork: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is one of the constants listed in [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest].

## Deprecated

- **paymentInstrumentName**: A description of the payment card that the user selected to fund the transaction.
